blocks.name: cchhllem
blocks.content: Lemma for chlbas and chlvsca . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cchhllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, ccnfld), cfv(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), csts, cop(cfv(cip, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cslot(c2))
  -| wcel(c2, cn)
  -| wo(wbr(c2, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(c0, ccnfld), cfv(c0, c1)), diffss(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i(cfv(c0, ccnfld), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr)), cfv(c0, co(cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), csts, cop(cfv(cip, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(s1))))))))
  setsnid(c0, cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), cfv(cip, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(s1)))))
  ndxid(c0, c2)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cip, cnx)), wne(c2, nat8))
  ax-mp(wne(c2, nat8), wo(wbr(c2, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, c2)))
  jaoi(wbr(c2, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, c2), wne(c2, nat8))
  necomd(c2, nat8, wbr(c2, clt, nat5))
  syl(wbr(c2, clt, nat5), wne(nat8, c2), wbr(c2, clt, nat8))
  mpan2(wbr(c2, clt, nat5), wbr(c2, clt, nat8), wbr(nat5, clt, nat8))
  5lt8()
  lttri(c2, nat5, nat8)
  5re()
  ltnei(c2, nat8)
  ltnei(nat8, c2)
  8re()
  nnrei(c2)
  neeq12i(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cip, cnx), c2, nat8)
  ndxarg(c0, c2)
  ipndx()
  mptru(wceq(cfv(c0, ccnfld), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr))))
  sralem(c0, ccnfld, cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), cr, c2, wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wss(cr, cfv(cbs, ccnfld)))
  sseqtri(cr, cfv(cbs, ccnfld), cc)
  ax-resscn()
  cnfldbas()
  fveq2i(c0, c1, co(cfv(cfv(csra, ccnfld), cr), csts, cop(cfv(cip, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(s1)))))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cchhllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` CCfld)=(c0 ` c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ)[sSet]<(· ` ndx),(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[×](* ` s1)))>)
  ⊣ c0 = Slot(c2)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ ℕ
  ⊣ (c2[<]5 ∨ 8[<]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ` CCfld)=(c0 ` c1), d(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i((c0 ` CCfld), (c0 ` c1), (c0 `((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ)), (c0 `(((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ)[sSet]<(· ` ndx),(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[×](* ` s1)))>)))
  setsnid(c0, ((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ), (· ` ndx), (s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[×](* ` s1))))
  ndxid(c0, c2)
  mpbir((c0 ` ndx)≠(· ` ndx), c2 ≠ 8)
  ax-mp(c2 ≠ 8, (c2[<]5 ∨ 8[<]c2))
  jaoi(c2[<]5, 8[<]c2, c2 ≠ 8)
  necomd(c2, nat8, c2[<]5)
  syl(c2[<]5, 8 ≠ c2, c2[<]8)
  mpan2(c2[<]5, c2[<]8, 5[<]8)
  5lt8()
  lttri(c2, nat5, nat8)
  5re()
  ltnei(c2, nat8)
  ltnei(nat8, c2)
  8re()
  nnrei(c2)
  neeq12i((c0 ` ndx), (· ` ndx), c2, nat8)
  ndxarg(c0, c2)
  ipndx()
  mptru((c0 ` CCfld)=(c0 `((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ)))
  sralem(c0, ccnfld, ((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ), cr, c2, wtru)
  eqidd(((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, ℝ ⊆(Base ` CCfld))
  sseqtri(cr, (Base ` CCfld), cc)
  ax-resscn()
  cnfldbas()
  fveq2i(c0, c1, (((subringAlg ` CCfld)` ℝ)[sSet]<(· ` ndx),(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[×](* ` s1)))>))
}
